_sText:
Official Map Port Created by granis for Source.

Surf map Tier 1-3. Tier 1 staged map with shortcuts of increasing difficulty making it a tier 3 map. Map inspired by kitsune (1 and 2) and omnific with the goal to provide a high quality map with good visuals that can be played by low teir players and high tier players alike! Thank you to the creators of these maps nyro, qr, checkem and Arblarg.

Port updates:

- Fixed glass texture rendering bug on ramps

- Modified fail teleports to allow tighter runs

Original CS:GO Map created by Hippy.
https://gamebanana.com/mods/82115
